item.title: Resnet50 classification REST API
item.description: Introduction I built a simple inference API backed by the famous pretrained CNN model ResNet50. The network is 50 layers deep and can classify images into 1000 object categories, such as keyboard, mouse, pencil, and many animals. Currently, the API is running on the same machine hosting this website : a simple t2.micro on AWS EC2. I am currently working on a front-end UI, which is already available at http://datascience.lays.pro.
